dc:title: News of C. W. Groups Given By Editor
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A series of stories about the work of Catholic Worker groups she recently visited on a speaking trip: Portsmouth and Newport, RI; Boston and Worchester, MA; Milwaukee; Chicago; Rochester, NY; Detroit; and Pittsburgh.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 335 1938-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
